1366410.name: Fantasy Grounds - Deadlands Lost Colony
1366410.description:
Deadlands Lost Colony

The story of
Deadlands continues.
The Last War on Earth destroyed the "Tunnel," the galactic wormhole between home and the colonists of the Faraway System.
Now they're trapped in the mining colonies of deep space or the lone inhabitable and often hostile planet of Banshee. Ancient and evil creatures called the Skinnies see their chance to strike, rallying Banshee's native anouks to wipe out the invaders.
The only ship capable of traveling between systems, Hellstromme Industries'
Unity, has returned. And with its cargo comes a final Reckoning.
Deadlands Lost Colony is a roleplaying game set in the award-winning, best-selling
Deadlands series. It requires the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition game system.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Aki Heikkinen, and Kevin Doswell
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
